conbody.p: This chapter describes the entities related to the Service model and common configurations in Smart Plan Suite (SPS).

The Service model comprises of top-level service entities that directly represent and define the services assigned and delivered to the subscribers, and configuration assisting in the simplification and usability of service definitions. The charging service, usage control service, and Internet of Things (IoT) policy service types can be defined for SPS. The services define the interaction between the network and the subscriber, and the way in which SPS delivers, collects, and rates the consumption of resources by subscribers.
